fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Watch over your target at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the beginning of the game, you will receive a player as your target.
- Your target cannot be a player who must die to win.
- Watching over your target Astrally heals them and removes all negative effects from them.
- You may watch over your target while dead.
- You may only watch over your target twice.
- If your target dies, you will become 96: Survivor, but you may not put on any bulletproof vests.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Keep your target alive until the end of the game.
